projects: [{"title":"AlterKGP","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"Present","description":"â€¢ Created a social media website aimed to provide curated content and notifications related to the institute's student activities at one placeâ€¢ Deployed website uses MERN stack with REST Architecture of API having CRUD functionality and hosted on a custom domainâ€¢ Supporting the web app is Alter2.2, a chrome extension that helps access Alter-KGP within Facebook"},{"title":"Assisted History Matching from Production Data using MRST","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"May 2021"},{"title":"Radon Flux Prediction using Discrete Fracture Network Model, Jadugoda","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"â€¢ Completed MSc. dissertation under Prof. Debashish Sengupta on predicting radon flux using a stochastic DFN modelâ€¢ The radon flux predicted by the generated fracture network for Jadugoda uranium mines, Jharkhand was within an acceptable error limit <5 %"}]
